page.title: 20Education in Thornton
page.content: Children in Thornton attend their own primary school, and at 11 transfer to {Lady Lumley's, Pickering,}where they join others from junior schools in Pickering and the surrounding villages. This entry was compiled by pupils and staff at L.L.S. during our Activity Week at the end of the Summer term. This is a 3-day period when there are no lessons, and instead pupils are given the opportunity to pursue interests under staff supervision. Their names include{Mr Ken Douglas,Mr} {Steve Peet, Miss Anna Doody,Sean } {Metcalf,Iain Roy,Francis Pearson,John} {Sellars,David Barf,Julia Wass,Gillian {Douglas,Dawn Allardice,Maribel {Baxandall,Natalie Hukin and Janet {Remmer. }
